Adds a mapID that this map service should have push for.

Parameters:
mapID The mapID that this service should have push for.
lastUpdateTime The time from which push data should be sent.
Returns:
True if mapID was added and false if mapID already exists.

virtual bool MapPushService::getPushPacketMaps (  PushPacket *  pushPacket,
set< SubscriptionResourceNotice > &  subscribed,
set< SubscriptionResourceNotice > &  unsubscribed,
bool &  isHeartBeat
)  [protected, virtual]
 

Read the wanted and unwanted maps from pushpacket.

Parameters:
pushPacket The pushPacket to read.
subscribed subscribed Set of successfully subscribed resources.
unsubscribed Set of recently removed resources.
isHeartBeat Set to true if pushPacket is a heartbreat and false if pushPacket is a push data packet.
Returns:
True if packet was decoded ok, false if strange packet.
